name: Insecure Bonding
description:
Test your trust in this multiplayer adventure game where one player knows the result. Will you trust them?

What is Insecure Bonding

Insecure Bonding is a 2 player game about trust, where both players control a single character. Each player is given the role of a Knower or Mover, which alternates every time the character is moved a tile. The premise is simple; the player who has the most points by the time the character reaches the end, wins. But be careful: If anyone reaches 0 points, both players lose!

The roles are as follows: The Knower knows what each surrounding tile does, while the Mover is responsible for moving the player character. Both players can see their own scores at any time by clicking “Show Secret”, but make sure to look away if it’s not your secret!
